name: Black Bean Rice Burgers
author: Carol Kinghorn
summary: These hearty and filling burgers are made with black beans and rice. Dressed up with a salsa and sour cream sauce, even your meat-and-potatoes man will love them.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Mash beans with a fork in a large bowl
Stir in rice, onion, egg, bread crumbs, and 2 tablespoons salsa; mix well
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat; drop bean mixture by 1/2-cupfuls into skillet and flatten to 1/2-inch thickness
Cook until each side is firm and browned, 4 to 5 minutes per side
Combine sour cream and 4 tablespoons salsa in a small bowl
Place a bean burger on bun with a lettuce leaf, 1 slice Cheddar cheese, and top with salsa mixture
